name: Call of Duty: League - Vegas Legion Team Pack 2024
summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Vegas Legion Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.
